OOC: Post did not show... must hurt people... many many people...

Deep in the atlantic at the second Infecticon base, Blight begins to 
pulsate a bright green, his paitience with the Predacon leader having 
run out. He storms up to Darkfate and looks into the bots eyes as his 
body pulses brighter sending intense heat out that would make 
Darkfates circuits sizzle.

Blight: "Where the hell are your men!? If they aren't here in five 
minutes I will turn you into a crater! And when your men do arrive 
after that I will have them blasted into oblivion!"

Elsewhere at the Main Infecticon base, Frostbite sits and ponders of 
the faction on the island a short distance from her own. She laughs 
evily as a plan formulates in her head before she opens a channel to 
both Alliance bases.

Frostbite: "This is commander Frostbite of the Infecticons. I would 
like to suggest an alliance between our two factions, my people can 
offer much in advanced technology to your own."
